html:
** Rivian Automotive Inc RIVN.O recently indicated to open at $120 vs IPO price of $78

** EV maker backed by Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O and Ford Motor Co F.N poised to make its hotly anticipated debut after blockbuster $12 bln IPO upsized due to strong demand (Full Story)

** Shares to commence trading on Nasdaq with symbol "RIVN"

** Amazon, T. Rowe Price, Franklin Templeton, Capital Research and Blackstone among a group of "cornerstone investors" who indicated to buy up to $5 bln of the offering, per the prospectus filing

** Morgan Stanley, Goldman and JP Morgan leading 22-firm underwriting group for the IPO


(Lance Tupper is a Reuters market analyst. The views expressed are his own)

(( lance.tupper.tr.com@reuters.net
lance.tupper@tr.com 1-332-219-1430) )
